text: Prosopocera belzebuth is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by James Thomson in 1857. It is known from Nigeria, the Ivory Coast, Togo, Senegal, the Central African Republic, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo.BioLib.cz - Prosopocera belzebuth. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Prosopocera belzebuth belzebuth Thomson, 1857 * Prosopocera belzebuth hintzi Aurivillius, 1922 * Prosopocera belzebuth infravalida Breuning, 1970 ==References== Category:Prosopocerini Category:Beetles described in 1857
title: Prosopocera belzebuth
